metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6265 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the pdf_load_xref function in pdf/pdf-xref.c in MuPDF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted PDF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-6265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.9a+ds1-1.1
mupdf-tools - 1.9a+ds1-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9a+ds1-1.1').
